website_summaries.verdict: This is a good plug adapter for those who have a lot of devices that they need to charge while traveling.
pros: Charge up to 4 devices at the same time
Pin-locking mechanism keeps the pins locked in place so the adapter doesn't fall out
cons: Some say it is hard to open some of the charge ports in order to use them

customer_reviews.title: Compact adapter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my children traveling to Europe to work there for a year. It is absolute perfect, it has everything in one place for all the places in Europe. She can travel and not worry about using her laptop or charging her phone, etc. For anybody traveling a lot, this is the adapter to get, the one that does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Beet rolls

customer_reviews.title: Great multifunction adapter
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Seems to work well so far. Nice to have so many USBs in addition to the main plug. I do see that it's a little loose in the outlet as some have said, but It stays in the wall fine with a semi-heavy adapter attached. Will give it a fill test next week in France, but so far seems great. Carrying case is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brett J. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger! Its lightweight anf compact. I can easily carry it in my bag. Plus it has 4 ports! I can charge so many devices at the same time and they all charge fast. I haven't noted any delays in charging or slow charging. 2.4 ans 2.1 A port so you can pick n choose. I charge my watch n phone with this! Plus when Im travelling abroad i take it with me so I dont need to buy a whole new charger! Worked fine in Asia and Europe!
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: BEST adapter ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled the world my entire life, mostly for business. I have had LOTS of different adapters. This is by far the best product I have ever owned. I had a similar one, but it was flimsy and the lock to keep the plugs in place didn't work very well. The blue color helps me remember it, as very few outlets and walls are dark blue, so it stands out in a hotel room. I am order two more as gifts, and one more for myself. The case is great, no wasted space. I can't speak for the durability as I have only used it on one trip so far, but it seems very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Berit in Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Update: One of the 4 USB ports broke after one week of use!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and will be testing it out in Iceland, Scotland, and Sweden. Very simple to operate and fits right with my other electronics. Appears to be very sturdy and well built. Will try to remember to post when I get back from the 3 week trip to discuss durability Works well and handles all of my devices. Do recommend purchasing the longer cords as the sockets in walls not always near place to lay device. Had to use chair to place mine. I purchased the longer chords but only brought one 🙄 I really love how the device fits securely in my travelon backpack.
customer_reviews.author: TravelingGal

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm in the UK
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to handle multiple needs for my UK trip including: using a straightener, plugging in my laptop, and plugging in multiple devices needing USB charge. It actually worked and did not do any popping or hissing as I have heard other adapters do. So, it feels safer and it's compact. Also, doesn't look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this...very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this charger once and all the usb (white chips) came off. I cannot return it because the return window is closed. I travelled oct 30-nov7. Now i cannot use it again. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RheaCO

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Worked as excepted. We traveled to Ireland (southern tour) and Amsterdam and converters work perfectly. Now one thing is true, when using the 2 prong European adapter it does sit a little loosely in the socket. It didnt fall out or lose charge, but I can imagine that if you had more than two devices plugged into it that it may fall out, but it can easily be propped up with something. All in all it worked and I'm thankful for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MeekTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Useless in Europe
customer_reviews.text: European outlets have had a collar around the outlet for years. You can't fit a large flat object like this into the collar to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Travel Adapter I’ve Found!
customer_reviews.text: Just used this plug for a three week trip to Europe and it was a lifesaver! What I love about it: Unlike many of these types of plugs, this one has a push-in feature that retracts each plug so nothing sticks out when you throw it in your suitcase. It also has a great variety of plus. We used the European plug in Italy and then found it wouldn’t fit when we moved to Malta. Never fear, the unit has a UK plug that wors in Malta as well. Am ordering two more of these because they work so well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Manor

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for Europe and it did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for Europe and it did not work in France. I needed it to recharge my phone and it would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S. Van Orden

customer_reviews.title: Looks sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and love the blue color. It also looks less flimsy than most other converters as plugs can't pop out of place. Very satisfied and can't speak to durability, yet, but hopeful this will last some time!
customer_reviews.author: pkpf83

customer_reviews.title: Worked in Europe & Japan
customer_reviews.text: I am an airline pilot who carries multiple items needing a charge. This worked in Europe & Japan and stayed very cool even with a load (see pic) the only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was because I have not been to Australia with the adapter , but have no doubt it should perform there as well.
customer_reviews.author: g cibulas

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Ordered hoping the device would charge my phone, tablet and fit bit charge 3. The device worked fine on a recent trip to Aruba. Although the current is same as USA, I wanted to ensure my electronics would charge using the device. All went as hoped, easy plug in and ports for USB, charging went smoothly. Will use in April on trip to Europe. The plug slides out and is easy to use. Can change between US, Europe and the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Duane A Nack

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Solution
customer_reviews.text: I bought my adapter just days before traveling to Europe. Delivery was SPEEDY and packaging minimal. Great! I threw it in my suitcase and used it without issue in Norway, France, Spain, and England for 30 days. I was most excited that I could plug up to 4 USB cords into the unit in addition to a standard US plug. Having the 4 USB ports and a US prong configuration makes it handy domestically too. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Akaha

customer_reviews.title: Europe plug doesnt come all the way out
customer_reviews.text: Europe plug doesnt come all the way out and therefore useless. I had to keep borrowing chargers throughout my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D.

customer_reviews.title: Either defective or unlucky but it didn't work for me and vendor didn't replace.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on my first trip; that is, when plugged into an EU plug, it did not transfer power to my US plug. It also didn't work in China. I called customer support, they promised to get back to me but didn't. Bad purchase, money wasted. I'm not sure if it was a bad one-off but this one was BAD If you're int he market, get this one in the link below, it's been with me around the world and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, compact, multi-USB
customer_reviews.text: This is really a well designed compact adapter in several colors, that provides 4 USB ports and 1 outlet for U.S. blade plugs. I learned that most modern electronic gizmos can use European rated juice without a voltage converter. This device is just a plug shape adapter and not a voltage converter, so it's perfect for charging the cell phone, iPad, wireless headphones, and FitBit via USB (cables not provided). The backside has all the funky plug shapes you will need as you roam around the world. Check your device before you travel to see if it can convert on it's own - you may not need the more expensive voltage converter and this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Don Con

customer_reviews.title: Worked in US, UK, Israel , Jordan and Egypt
customer_reviews.text: This adapter is compact and easy to use. I especially found the locking aspect useful, it kept the prongs extended until I pushed the button to withdraw them into the adapter. I had no problem using the adapter in US, UK, Israel, Jordan and Egypt. I was using the USB ports almost exculsively to charge my watch, phone, & iPad at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: pam c.

customer_reviews.title: Handy--Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: This compact multi-county adapter is just as advertised. it is relatively small in size and comes in a zippered case (handy)--easy to toss into my travel bag (during or between trips). In addition, the locking mechanism is perfect...something you don't realize you need until you try to use an adapter without one!! it works just as described, and i will buy a second one for a friend. (PS....it DOESN'T include a converter for India, so if that is on your itinerary...you will need a separate plug.)
customer_reviews.author: Sea Bird

customer_reviews.title: Compact, efficient, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and normally have to keep up with numerous country specific adapters. This device has them all in one and its smaller than some of my others. The best thing about this one is that it has 4 USB slots and that saves me from carrying other adapters as well!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Very functional, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, meets most travel power plug adapter needs in one 1.75" x 2"x 2.75" unit. Only caution would be to handle and use with reasonable care ..i.e. don't be overly rough with it either in using the slide tabs to change the style of plug or in unplugging or plugging cords to it or plugging the unit in for use. The light weight results from using lightweight plastics the are likely prone to wear and tear. But for the weight, we're more than happy with this for travel, especially if not for constant daily use! If you're using over a long period, more than occasional periodic use, might not last as long? Still a great buy for $10-15!
customer_reviews.author: F. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our trip to Asia. Needed something with lots of USB options and very small as we are only taking 1 backpack each for 10 days. This seems to fit perfectly for both those categories. Something to remember that this will NOT convert 220 to 110, but rather adapts the plugs to fit our US style plug. We didn't need a voltage converter, just a plug adapter with USB options. Looks to be very sturdy and was packaged well. My cousin has this same adapter and she uses it ALL the time. She travels around the world multiple times per month and LOVES hers. Very excited to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Berbaler

customer_reviews.title: Design is a little poor
customer_reviews.text: So I love this! Its super light and can charge a lot of things at once, because of all the space, however I just tried to use it in Australia and it was such a pain because where the prongs come out on this converter is just too low and since Australia has switches above every outlet the converter was sitting just too high and would hit the switch off, or fall out of the outlet so I couldn't even charge things. Might still work better for the US (and the other countries)() bc it sits in the outlet fine, but def not Australia unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an adapter for my recent trip to Ghana, and I didn't realize until the last minute. I was going to get one made for plugs until I realized that it was more efficient to just get multiple USB ports for all of the devices I need to charge in a day (phone, Apple Watch, power bank, occasionally my iPad and its keyboard, etc.) Having 4 ports was plenty and this was compact enough to fit in my carryon for the 2 long layovers in Amsterdam. It's also really nice to not have to switch the plugs in and out like old adapters- you just slide out the one you need! I definitely recommend this adapter for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Versitile Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Overall this adapter was easy to use and adjust to Australia's outlets. It was great to have an outlet that allowed for direct plug in of phones and tablets. My only caveat is that my brand new Samsung tablet too a long time to charge at slow charging, even on the fast charge USB side, however, my Samsung phone and my niece's Iphone 6 and apple tablet did not seem to have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Mohney

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I recently took a trip to the UK and was looking to replace the dinky adapter plugs I used on previous travels. Although this adapter is a bit on the bulky side, it feels sturdy and good quality. My favorite feature is the multiple USB ports, which made charging my phone, tablet, etc a lot more efficient while abroad. I even find myself using this adapter at home, here in the US, because of this option. If you're looking to streamline your packing this a great way of getting rid of excess cables and plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Yesica B

customer_reviews.title: Please buy
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid traveler, so this product makes a lot of sense for me. I would repurchase this product for a traveling friend. You can use all four USB ports at once and the main port in the front. I have only used it on three trips, but I have not had any problems with it so far. I also love the little bag it comes with. I keep it in my traveling bag so that I am always ready to go. Finally, the connecting ports are easy to slide out and back in. Great value for what you get in return.
customer_reviews.author: Desmand’s Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. Tends to fall out but it does work.
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing is nice because it has lights on it .m but in the EU the way it's designed isn't good... It falls out of plugs constantly. I made it work but dang.... It wasn't good. The EU plugs have a circular slot that the prongs can go into and this just has a thing rectangle. It does not do a good job of staying in and you have to be super careful Ok the other hand I made it 2 weeks in Europe with my phone charged.... Just had to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Compact Plug Adapter Works for Any Country You'll Be Off To
customer_reviews.text: This travel adapter was perfect for a recent trip to Europe, although it looks like it'll work for many other countries outside the EU. I had one similar to this previously and it didn't work so well in a lot of EU plugs because of their recessed outlets, this one works beautifully and is compact and comes with a nice carrying case. The other one I had would also often make a soft electronic humming noise that could drive you slightly crazy at night, but this one is whisper quiet. Note, this is a plug adapter only, it does not convert currency/voltage. Most modern electronics are fine with either voltage, but most things with a heating element will not be.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Fulton

customer_reviews.title: First rate power adapter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this power adapter for a trip to Italy, which can be tricky for power adapters due to the variety of receptacle designs (some receptacles are recessed and not all adapters allow for that). This SublimeWare adapter worked perfectly everywhere we stayed. We also used another brand adapter and half way through the trip, one of the USB ports started having difficulties with consistent charging. Not so with the SublimeWare adapter, which worked perfectly throughout our trip. This is a great adapter and I highly recommend it for use in EU countries (which is the only option we have tested it with.)
customer_reviews.author: crh20817

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Device, Perfect for my International Trip
customer_reviews.text: not much to say, this device offers everything advertised The 4 usb ports made charging all my devices insanely easy, didnt have to fight with fitting those obnoxious USB bricks. I was able to charge my Switch, my smart phone, my gf's smart phone and her smart watch simultaneously. I noticed it got pretty hot during charging sessions but I'd blame that on the shit wiring/electrical setup of the home I was staying at, since I was charging alot of devices at once. Solid price for what is being offered, I highly recommend this product for your travel needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Veedell

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Combo Convertor
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this combo convertor for over a week now without any issues in the UK; besides the UK adapter you have an option for the standard EU and USA plugs – all built so anyone from these areas can use their devices in other countries without having to carry around multiple plugs depending upon your destination. In comparison to other adapters I have used over the years, what I like best about this one is there are 4 USB plugs in the top so you only have to use one plug as well as only carry this adapter vs. multiple ones. I would recommend this combo convertor for international travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: The Australian adapter does not stay in socket.
customer_reviews.text: This adapter does not do the most important thing: stay in the socket. I bought it for a trip to Australia and it has been a challenge to use it every time. The block is heavy and the prongs don’t stay well in the socket so the adapter could never be plugged into a wall. Every time I had to put something under the adapter to hold it up. This is the ONE thing it has to do and it doesn’t. I had to buy a different set of adapters because this one just would not stay. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great option for the frequent traveler
customer_reviews.text: I had a fairly random collection of plug converters collected from travels over the years, but never one that could do it all. I got this for a trip to Cape Town and fell in love--it was able to charge my phone, watch, and computer while I used a flat iron. Great red color, works like a charm, and was compact enough to carry around reasonably. The only complaint I had was that it gets a little bottom-heavy. If the wall outlet you're using doesn't have a surface under it to set the charger on, you may need to stack some books to get it to sit flush in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Purchases this item for a trip to South America. First time use found that the USB ports did not work at all. Could only use this with a plug. Very disappointed in this product. Unfortunately by the time I returned to the US it was outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: A perfect adapter that allows for so much!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a trip to Europe and I never ran out of ports to use to charge my phone, batteries, cameras, powerbanks, and everything else. This was a multi-tool for tech! I say WAS because in today's world, the usb ports are little weak for the new iPhone 11 Pro max so it won't charge it well. But when I used the iPhone 10 it was perfect. It made traveling through the EU a breeze as I never needed another wall adapter in order to charge my electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Ravenix

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for Travel
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I used this for our recent trip to Europe and LOVED it. We had another adaptor that we used that only had one plug in. This was so great because you could charge something in the plug, but also had USB connectors to charge other electronics as well. SO nice to have and super easy to use. Even came with a nice little case. We ordered the adaptor in red so we wouldn't leave it plugged in somewhere and forget it, and it was super easy to spot in the walls and in our luggage! 10/10 would recommend this. I'm honestly tempted to use it at my house, it is so convenient and nice!
customer_reviews.author: K. STJOHN

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Be wary this is not a wattage converter nor is it advertised to be so don't buy it with those intentions. It is great for international travel and even at home in the U.S. I used it in England and Ukraine and it worked just fine. I did buy a wattage converter that ended up ruining my hair straightener so I had to buy one with a European plug so now I use this thing daily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Woodberry

customer_reviews.title: Great but on Hold
customer_reviews.text: I had a trip planned for June which now has been postponed due to the Coronavirus. I will be using the item but at a later date. However, the service from the vendor was great. It came faster than I expected and the company reached out to insure that the item had arrived and I was pleased with my purchase. The price was great and yes I am pleased. Will just be using it a bit later.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all travel, especially international.
customer_reviews.text: On my last Europe vacation, my daughter had this adapter. I had a single adapter which worked ok but I had to either carry several with hopes that there would be enough outlets in each hotel or simply alternate what and when I charged my items. Once I saw what my daughter was using I realized how simple multiple plug ins could be. This unit is adaptable for multiple types of plug ins plus I can plug in several of my electronics at once and only need one outlet. So great and so convenient. From now on it will be all I need for all of my traveling plug in needs. The carry case is super too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a travel adapter.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were traveling to Europe and needed a travel adapter to charge our 2 phones, portable battery charger, and my smart watch. Thankfully, this thing has 4 usb slots to handle all of the devices. It even has a spot that you can plug in a standard US power plug into the adapter. Just be aware that it states that it won't change the voltage so if you're using a normal plug to charge any device that doesn't have a converter built into it, you'll zap your device.
customer_reviews.author: Harout T.

customer_reviews.title: I was dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This plug blew as soon as I plugged my travel hairdryer in....I then could only use it to charge my phone and Ipad. I was very disappointed. Luckily in Italy the condo had a hairdryer I could use with the type of electrical plug they have. I was disappointed because I paid $20 dollars and my dtr had a cheaper $9 one and it worked better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: SKR

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly and Convienient
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfect on my recent trip to Norway, Finland, Sweden, and the Netherlands. I especially like the multiple USB ports which allowed me to my US plug adapter behind, saving space, and charge both my cell phones at the same time. Well built, easy to use, at a great price. I highly recommend this product and my transaction with the seller was seamless.
customer_reviews.author: WH123

customer_reviews.title: Love this for domestic and international travel!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this adapter! My job takes me all over the world, and this adapter has worked flawlessly! I used to carry around a bunch of adapters so that I could plug in all of my electronics, but I have found that having this adapter fills the overall needs. It has 4 USB ports that I use all at once, with no overheating, along with the plug that can easily convert to any plug type. It has been a lifesaver for me in all of my travels!
customer_reviews.author: Bob N

customer_reviews.title: Convenient adapter with USB outlets - check country list to be sure your destination is covered.
customer_reviews.text: Has many options, but won't work in southern Africa without an additional adapter. Once I got that, it worked great. The 4 USB outlets charged the electronics well, saving power outlets for other needs. Most modern devices with an external power supply work on any power, so all that's needed is to get the plugs adapted to an available outlet. This does that well and packs easily with the plugs unlocked and retracted.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Lion

customer_reviews.title: Only Half Worked
customer_reviews.text: The AC / DC did not work at all. The USB ports worked just fine. Unfortunately, in preparation for our overseas trip, it was purchased a couple of months prior and once home, it was too late to return it through Amazon. I've not found a way to contact the manufacturer / supplier for a replacement so it appears I'm stuck with a useless purchase. If they would contact me to replace, I would happily alter the review as it is a convenient design and size.
customer_reviews.author: BBechtel

customer_reviews.title: Great Universal Adapter!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter is as small as it can possibly be, light weight and simple to use. It even comes with a very nice vinyl zipper case to protect your clothes from getting snagged by the various levers. The directions are clear, but it is well-marked and very intuitive, so they were virtually unnecessary. And — the price is right. Just FYI, if you are including Italy in your trip, you will need a separate adapter. Italy does not use the same electric plugs as the rest of the EU.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Blew with a day of use.
customer_reviews.text: The adapter has a fuse at 8 Amps max with one replacement tucked in. I bought two adapters and within one day of use 3 fuses were gone hence the plug part does not work anymore well unless I keep replacing the fuses. The USB part is still ok. I have different adapters in the house that work fine. So I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: ABG

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea, assume it will work well
customer_reviews.text: We haven't yet used this adapter, but I love the idea of having a charger with all components build in instead of having to carry around a case with country appropriate plug in components. Product is compact, should take up a small space inside a shoe, perhaps. Very reasonably priced. Will travel to several countries next month, so hoping this will supply all our charging needs.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Handy adapter,  versatile and easy to pack for travel
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it comes in a small size and is easy to pack. I am waiting to use it overseas on our next trip. I think it is nice that it is all purpose because it has three different settings and can be used in many countries. I bought it because the last time we went overseas we needed to have an adapter to use any electronic device such as hair dryer or a shaver to make them work. Different countries have different voltages that they use for their electric appliances and our daily appliances will not work without an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zubke

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Viet Nam
customer_reviews.text: In February we traveled throughout Viet Nam and it was for that trip that we purchased this adapter. It worked well in every hotel where we stayed, from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon). We do not use hair dryers, so I can't comment on that. But we used it for phone and laptop charging, and a CPAP machine. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 2much2do

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I travel regularly to several different countries in Europe and Asia, and this little adapter is a life saver. I've got two of them, and both work flawlessly. It's nice to not have to worry about which adapter to bring on a trip. This one has them all covered.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbax300

customer_reviews.title: Best travel plug adapter!
customer_reviews.text: I had very very limited luggage space on my international travel but of course we would be hopping around from hotel to hotel and I didn't want a large converter, but I also needed one that would speed charge my phone, camera and still allow for a hair dryer or curling iron. You will not be disappointed, this product was amazing and my sister and I were charging both of our phones as lightening speed which was great for the quick stops back to the room before another excursion!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Greece and Scotland
customer_reviews.text: I've had adapters in the past that came with pieces and always ended up losing the pieces. I bought this for a trip to Greece and loaned it to a friend for her trip to Scotland. Worked great! Compact, prongs slide in and out easily, and the prongs stay put either sticking out or tucked in until you release them to move. 4 USB ports allowed me to charge 2 phone and 2 tablets overnight. I also like that it has a textured surface that is easy to grasp and to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel adapter!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter worked flawlessly for my trip and I have no doubt it will continue to provide years of use. The retractable prongs are ingenious and really make it a preferable design over other travel adapters I have used. This adapter is definitely worth the money as it replaced 4 other styles of travel adapters/USB adapters in my bag. Wouldn’t hesitate to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: USB ports ARE be useful!
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used the product yet and will update this review afterwards, but it arrived in excellent condition. I like the included travel case which should provide protection in the luggage. The product appears to be well constructed and I like the USB ports which are not included on all international adapters. Update: We took this adapter to Ireland, and it worked great, and the USB ports were what we used most! Definitely recommend this adapter for international travel.
customer_reviews.author: ML Wells

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Power Plug adapter in Dec 2018... I purchased for an upcoming trip to Italy. While I haven't yet used it outside the USA, I can tell you that it's very easy to use, completely matches the description from the seller in it's ability to work in Europe, Australia, USA, etc. It's construction is solid and I tested it on my home outlet (of course in USA) and it worked great. My trip to Italy is in June 2019, following that trip, I'll provide an update to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kenh2o

customer_reviews.title: Great Adaptor!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter is great. I love that it has 4 USB ports and one to use a plug. Essentially you can charge 5 items at once. I bought another of these adaptors at Walmart but it only had 2 USB ports. I’m so glad I bought this one on Amazon. I don’t travel internationally a ton, but next time I do I want to order another of these. With 7 people in our family it was easy to charge everyone’s devices. The little pouch it comes with is really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Discovered a surprise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this travel adapter so that I could plug in my multi port power plug during my travels and it has served me well over the last 3 years. I finally this year discovered (even though it was clearly listed) the USB ports under the adapter! I was so focused on why I had bought this that I didn’t bother to read the packaging and or look at it properly. I was so excited to have found this that I purchased another one so that I can have two compact, with carrying case adapters that’s are capable of charging 8 total usb devices and two plugs. Love it! Makes for a great gift as well for fellow travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Be better power prepared
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this adapter BEFORE I landed in a foreign country. Walked the streets of Auckland New Zealand looking for a simple power adapter. Time and money lost. This SublimeWare multi-plug unit will charge 4 USB’s and pass through one original foreign voltage, no conversion to your home plug voltage. Great travel case included.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well - almost
customer_reviews.text: Used it in Australia and it worked extremely well with one exception. The exception was because I didn't really know how my 110V soldering iron would respond to the current. Apparently it was not enough to convert the 220 or maybe 240V so my soldering iron burned out.. It did work well for all of the USB ports and I will have to find out what happened with the soldering iron.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Went on vacation to Spain recently. At the last minute decided to purchase a converter. I checked all the reviews and ended up with this one. It was great. Has 4 ports for a USB connection as well as 3 connectors, for US/Australia, Europe & The UK. Says a total of over 150 countries. Compact and comes in a little faux leather case. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dreemer

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made, Easy to Use and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This international charger is exactly what was I was looking for when heading to Iceland! I'll never need to buy another charger. There's a plug for every country, along with USB ports on the top to charge up to four devices. It worked well, and I love the travel case that comes with it. Easy to transport, lightweight and easy to use. We didn't have any issues, and I highly recommend this international charger.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Travelers
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are veteran travelers and I think this is a must have device for any travelers that go both domestically and especially internationally. We will never leave home without it! I also love the multiple portals so that my husband and I can both plug our devices in. I will be buying an additional one in the near future. Always good to have a His & Hers. Good Customer Service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ang B.

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it—in an outlet in Hong Kong—it went pop and started smoking! You can see the burn marks on the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and weight an issue
customer_reviews.text: The plug features various support however it would not work in Boeing or Airbus airplanes. It’s too heavy for most outlets so if the plug is vertical the plug fit is loose and could fall out or not make proper connection to get power tried in 6 airplanes, 2 hotels, 5 airports in Tokyo, Singapore, DallasTexas, Taipei, and Hong Kong.?i was just trying to use USB feature to charge my phone
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: If you are traveling abroad, get this adapter!
customer_reviews.text: We used this hand adapter throughout Italy and Sicily. It easily kept our iPads and iPhones charged and allowed us to plug in other items if needed. It’s compact and fit easily into our backpacks or suitcase. We ended up using this adapter over another we had also brought with us because the charging ports lended it to multiple plug or devices. I highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Debra G.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for my Europe trip!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this adapter so much! It came with a little black pouch to store it in, had 4 USB ports, a USA plug in and fit every power outlet in Italy. I went to 10 different cities, Rome, Florence, Cinque Terre, Venice, Milan, etc. and it fit in every outlet. I had my dual voltage straightener, iPhone, apple watch, and portable charger all plugged in at the same time and it worked great. Can’t recommend this adapter enough!
customer_reviews.author: Fi

customer_reviews.title: Flexible usage for travel
customer_reviews.text: This works quite well and covers the areas where I travel to most. It is a little bulky, but better than the alternative (being without). And having the USB ports included means that you can charge multiple devices while the main plug in in used. I have used this on 4 international trips so far with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: (This applies to the French adaptor. ) I was ...
customer_reviews.text: (This applies to the French adaptor.) I was able to plug in three items into the USB portals, but when I added a fourth, the adaptor began to pull away from the wall socket. I had to prop it up with a table and books to keep it from completely falling out. Also, in one hotel the outlets were about 1/2" below a shelf and there was not enough room to accommodate the adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: BVO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel companion device.
customer_reviews.text: Used this unit in Europe and it worked exactly as intended. I loved having the USB ports so I didn't have to bring along additional USB chargers for two iPhones and an iPad. I also could plug in my gopro and SLR camera battery charger as well so one device took care of all the devices I had to travel with. It's hard to beat that level of convenience.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for travel to Europe or the USA - Get Two of Them!
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as advertised. Loved the 4 USB ports. The only issue we had was the first fuse was blown and fortunately there is a spare with the unit. When you purchase I would plug in US or elsewhere to ensure that unit works. From blow dryer to curling iron to charging laptops and tablets this converter was perfect! I recommend that you by two so that you have the redundancy. There were times that we needed 2 110V options and we had to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Apalko

customer_reviews.title: In Australia, the bulky size interferes with wall outlet switches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our vacation in Australia. Strangely (or stupidly), every wall AC outlet in Australia has on-off switches on the panel. This adaptor's bulky size interferes with the switches so that the adapter cannot be inserted to a fully secure position.
customer_reviews.author: ARK

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 days & then blew fuse
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for 3 days (plug & USB ports) then, the plug portion quit working. USB ports still all worked. When I got home I read about the fuse & changed it and then everything worked again. There were a couple of reviews that said the fuse kept blowing every time they would change it, so now I'm worried that might happen to me when I'm stuck in another country & I won't be able to use my electrical devices.
customer_reviews.author: zandub

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in China as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The listing says it will work in China, this is a lie. It will work elsewhere with the China/Australia type plug, but will not work in China with the US 110 plugs. Fix the misleading information.
customer_reviews.author: untouchable

customer_reviews.title: Portable, perfect for international travel
customer_reviews.text: This plug point for international sockets works very well. Places I’ve tested include in India, England and the US. It works on all the European sockets as well. I like the USB sockets for phone charging too. Great product for international travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I like the red color, which makes it easy to not forget in hotels if you're traveling... and that's all I can say that's positive about this adapter. Maybe my family received a dud, but this adapter did not work at all for us. I'm so glad we brought a backup adapter (that is over 15 years old) for our trip to Europe!
customer_reviews.author: DearHeart

customer_reviews.title: I love these little converters!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this converter so much that I purchased two of these in blue. The first in March 2019 for a trip to Thailand and a second in August 2019 as I was going back to Asia and then Europe. After some months of use, I can say that they are sturdy and attractive. I’ve had no issues of cords not disconnecting or falling out. It works for UK, EU and USA/Australian and four separate USB charging slots 2.1A and 2.4A. One improvement would be if it had a USB-C slot to charge my MacBook, but overall it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: TruthBeTold

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our travels around Europe and it was so handy. It’s nice and small, but a wonderful tool to just throw in your carry on. All of the adapter fit well and on top of the main plug there are quite a few USB plugins which allow multiple devices to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light to fit in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved my purchase. I used my adapter during my travels in Europe which was perfect. All ports worked. Although the ports seemed to be a bit loose at times. I adjusted the way I plugged the adapter into the outlet so that my device wouldn't fit loose and become disconnected. One day, while unplugging a device, the entire adapter fell apart. It just happened. I was unable to put it back together. I'll have to make another purchase because it is a necessity for travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use. One piece. Used in Italy. Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: We brought this adapter to Italy. We were able to charge our iPhones, Android phones, iPads. I used it to run my CPAP machine all night. Zero issues with this adapter. Very easy to use. No extra parts to carry around. Built well. Nice zippered cloth carry cover. I am purchasing another one as a gift. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie in VA

customer_reviews.title: Best adapter I have
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot, and I had an adapter before this one that was lacking in some compatibility and adaptability, especially for Europe. Plus, it had no USB ports. This adapter, however, is lightweight, durable, and has a slew of inlets/outlets for use. The adapter stays cool, even when I have my phone, iPod, and laptop plugged in. Everything charges appallingly fast. I also like the orange glow, which is nice on the eyes in a dark room (making it great for travel). I also like the protective case that the adapter came with, so I don't have to worry about any prongs breaking or bending. Overall, very happy with a purchase and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Borrowed permanently.
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this product. First time was on a trip to Africa... and the folks there all wanted one. So I gave mine away at the end of that trip. Bought another one for myself this time, and my husband has “borrowed” it for his trip to Europe. Have a feeling it’s been borrowed permanently:)
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I went to Russia with this thing and it was perfect! Super easy to use and figure out. Fits just right. I love that it has multiple usb slots to charge devices. I used my hair straightener with this in Russia and it heats up real quick! Comes in a little black protective case. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: After computer we ordered from Amazon came with a foreign charger we couldn't use or chg computer. After attempting to get right charger with no luck we finally ordered this adapter and after 2 months we finally were able to charge and use the computer!! To bad they can't send correct charger for the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Snider

customer_reviews.title: Press the button to close prongs. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Traveling to Egypt and last minute my sister and I realized we needed an adapter for chargers and such. This charger was versitile and a great price, especially since it adapted for multiple countries. Only downside, figuring out how change or close the plug was frustrating. There is a release button on the side opposite the sliders. If you don't push this button, you will never get the prongs to retract without damaging the unit. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BkRocka

customer_reviews.title: Compact and versatile for international travel
customer_reviews.text: About to take this little device abroad so can't give a complete user review. But love the small footprint, light weight, three int'l plug ins, the FOUR usb ports plus a plug in. My usb cords all plugged in and ready for packing. A big improvement over the large USB power strip I used to travel with. No surge, so ok with cruises.
customer_reviews.author: Pmlala

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: All the pin is working as expected but it's not firm enough when pressing against the socket and leaving a somewhat gap in-between the socket and the adapter itself. I'm using the UK plug btw. for the AU/NZ plug, it's not strong enough to punch thru socket with 3 holes for some old socket, and the pin got pushed back into the adapter 8(
customer_reviews.author: Macomatic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for International Travel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a European trip. Indispensable item! Easy to use. Small size was GREAT. Multiple charging ports - wonderful. Plan to purchase several more as gifts for friends who will be traveling to Europe in the spring. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: Strong Build and super convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've used these same type of adapters from other brands and this one definitely has the strongest build! Even the plastic finish is a much higher quality giving it a more solid feel. All the sliding parts stay in their places well and the 4 USB slots are a HUGE win for traveling! This is my new go-to adapter not just when I'm traveling but even around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: compact and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I travel internationally enough to need a plug that will charge my devices, cameras, and some equipment that needs a good old fashion plug. My old adapter had multiple parts that needed to be changed around depending on the type of outlet. This one has it all in one neat, simple device that is simple to use. Includes USB charging systems too, which my old device did not have. Great idea and light for the road. Really like it, now a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: prince kuyper of california

customer_reviews.title: Great adapter!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to take a business trip to the Middle East. I needed an adapter to allow me to charge my laptop, phone, and various other small items. It only took a minute to figure out how to properly use this adapter, and I had no problems with it. I recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: WEL

customer_reviews.title: Small and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of days before leaving on a trip to Switzerland. I absolutely loved it! It’s a good size, so it’s easy to fit multiple plugs into it. I loved the USB port feature so I was able to charge my phones and camera batteries simultaneously. It has adapters for multiple countries which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjini Sathianarayanan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAVEL PLUG
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to Europe twice recently and this travel plug proved to be invaluable. Not only does it provide an outlet for a USA plus, but just as important, it offers multiple USB ports! So this one plug was all I needed to keep all my Apple products charged. Great product, Great price, and Great after-market customer service. 100% recommend this travel plug.
customer_reviews.author: NFCfromNYC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic single-person Adaptor
customer_reviews.text: Have used all three adaptors in 240V to 110V input for a high-draw (800W) gaming laptop, and phone charging, simultaneously. Has performed flawlessly so far. The only thing I've noticed so far has been a very slight but noticeable high-pitched whine occasionally when charging a phone while sleeping. Went away after a few minutes, and still infinitely quieter than the 3-plug Bestek adaptor I had prior to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from a trip through Southeast Asia and used the adapater from Singapore to Hong Kong. The multiple ports made it possible to charge all our phones and watches overnight and use my curling iron (adaptable voltage) the next day. It's our new international travel buddy.
customer_reviews.author: disudds

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months, and have used in in France, Taiwan, Korea, and back at home. Works exactly as advertised. The 4 USB plugs are Da Bomb- awesome even back at home traveling in the USA, instead of carrying 3 chargers for my 3 devices I can just take this. It’s just a little bulky for traveling but makes up for it as you’re not carrying multiple chargers and all the different adapters are integrated inside.
customer_reviews.author: sfm

customer_reviews.title: Power Plug Adapter
customer_reviews.text: I could not use it for over a month and we have been writing to and fro on the Internet about it. A friend of mine had to use a lot of power to press the plug into the adapter to be able to use it. I did not have the kind of power to press it in. So please be aware of this in the future. As for now I have now had it plugged into the wall here in Spain to lit up an US lamp/bulb I am testing. So that works. I need to use it for my NuWave oven too and my alkaline machine, which take higher voltage than the lamp. I hope it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry, but I have not used it yet. However, I am very impressed with the quality of the product. The zippered cover was what made me decide to get it, and I am happy that I did. I expect to be using this adapter for many years. I would love to write another review after using it.
customer_reviews.author: joyous reader

product_meta.title: International Power Adapter Travel Plug - 4 USB Ports Universal Work for 150 Countries - 120 Volt Adapter - Adapter Type C Type A Type G Type I f for UK Japan China eu Europe European By SublimeWare
feature_bullets: [The perfect worldwide travel Adaptor] – use This universal power adaptor to 150+ countries, fits with us UK EU China outlets. This all in one travel Adaptor comes in one piece, and where many USB travel adapter comes in many pieces.

[CHARGING 4 DEVICES] – The only travel adapter you will need! Charge two phones, a tablet and camera with this travel adapter! Compatible with: iphone 11 Pro Max, XR, iPad Pro, Samsung Galaxy S10 Plus, One Plus 7 Pro, Huawei and Powerbank

[4 PORT USB INTERNATIONAL PLUG FOR TRAVEL] – Multi USB Port Hub with 4 Smart USB Ports 2×2.4A/2×2.1A, at 3500mA. Charge up to four devices at the same time, which the ports automatically adapting the output for each one accordingly.

[PIN LOCKING MECHANISM FOR SECURE PLUGIN] - Don't you hate when you press the pins sinks back into the Travel Adapter when you press it in the outlet? This Universal Travel Adapter locks and unlocks the 8 pins securely into its fixed positions
[PLEASE NOTE] - This is not a converter between voltages. Make sure voltage on the outlet and are compatible with the electronics used or getting a voltage converter with this adapter.
